titleStmt.title: A faithful declaration of Christes holy supper comprehe[n]ded in thre sermo[n]s, preached at Eaton Colledge, by Roger Hutchinson. 1552. Whose contentes are in the other syde of the lefe.
titleStmt.author: Hutchinson, Roger, d. 1555.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Day, dwelling ouer Aldersgate,
publicationStmt.date: 1560. Cum gratia & priuilegio Regiæ maiestatis per septennium.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
